wikipedia_page.main: Rev. Henry Holmes Stewart (8 November 1847 – 20 March 1937) was a Scottish clergyman who was a member of the Wanderers team which won the FA Cup in 1873. He also played for the Scottish team in 1872 in the last of the series of representative football matches against England.

response: * Lady Beatrice Diana Cecilia Carnegie (1852–1934), who married Rev. Henry Holmes Stewart, Rector of Michaelston-le-Pit and son of James Stewart of Cairnsmore.
